channel.title: Dress Up & Makeup on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Dress Up & Makeup on Game6r

item.title: Game Wedding Dress Up and Makeup
item.description: The process of the game Wedding Dress Up and Makeup is dedicated to preparing for the wedding. The girl wants to be truly beautiful on such an important holiday. Your task is to treat the skin of her face with useful products, and then apply makeup and choose a chic outfit. Don’t forget about various accessories.

item.title: Legendary Fashion: Cleopatra
item.description: After starting this game, you will be transported to Ancient Egypt, where you will meet Cleopatra. This queen is used to always looking attractive, and now she is waiting for your help. You need to create an outfit for her by selecting the elements of clothing and their color. Also take care of the hair and makeup of this femme fatale.
